Html:
I just wanted to see some points on documentation as mention on release notes but could not find it. CodeDrop 6 still contains the document file "Composite Application Guidance for WPF and Silverlight.chm" in root directory. Or is it externally reference now? 

Regards,
Alexander
Documentation seems to be missing :O   The drop page suggest it is included in the drop???

Sorry about that - the file wasn't picked when we created the drop.   We are working to upload a CHM today for drop 7.

thanks Larry

You can now download the chm file from the Drop 7 home page.
Just ensure your chm file is not blocked before you open it:
 Download the chm file to your file system. Right click the chm file and go to properties, and click "Un-block."
